duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide exceptional customer service and assistance with banking transactions through various channels.
Handle and balance cash tills in an accurate and efficient manner.
Learn about and promote different banking products and services to customers.
Create great first impressions with customers and provide an outstanding customer experience.
Work at different branches and locations, including occasional trips to different areas.
Participate in fully paid on-the-job training for three months.
Refer customers to appropriate bank partners and assist with their inquiries and needs.

education_certification.credential: High School Diploma or equivalent (Associate's or Bachelor's preferred)
